game.name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 1
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 애니메이션, 만화를 통해 많은 사랑을 받은 록맨 에그제가 컬렉션 버전으로 등장. 본 작품 Vol.1에는 「ROCKMAN EXE」부터 「ROCKMAN EXE 3」까지의 4작품(각 타이틀의 다른 버전 포함)이 수록되어 있으며 일러스트나 BGM을 감상할 수 있는 갤러리 등의 추가 요소도 탑재! 이밖에도 대망의 온라인 통신에도 대응하였습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The renowned Mega Man Battle Network series is back! Vol. 1 contains Mega Man Battle Network 1-3, including both versions of Mega Man Battle Network 3 for a total of four titles, plus additional features like a gallery of illustrations and music! In addition, online play is supported!

reviewHighlights.text: I have such fond memories of this late night. I would just be jacking in all night. Sometimes I'd jack out just for variety but I always found myself...
I remember bringing Megaman Battle Network 3 to show and tell in Kindergarten. I am a pharmacist now. This game was also great on the Steam Deck.
